director.name: 赫里斯托·乔治乌 Christos Georgiou

introduction: A doctor swears to avenge the unlawful death of a young patient. Can justice be served or will he become the victim instead? When a young girl dies on his operating table, surgeon Filipos Razis swears to bring a criminal organ trade gang to justice. The criminals, however, are one step ahead, and from their prosecutor Filippos becomes their victim. His only allies in this chase are his friend doctor Raphael and fierce journalist Thalia. Filippos risks not only his own safety, but also the safety of his loved ones. Now Filippos has to make a life-changing decision. Should he deal with his wife, Maritina Apergi, or fight for a better world? But is his fall the end or a new beginning?
